scripts.build: rm -rf lib && tsc && prettier "**/*.[jt]s" --write --loglevel silent && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('./lib/package.json', JSON.stringify(Object.assign(require('./package.json'), { main: 'index.js' }), null, 2))"
scripts.prepare: ls index.js || echo "Can't locate package build!" && exit 1
